metadata.description: "May your code be clean and your systems stable!" ✨

hero.title: Hi! I'm Kaeeraa
hero.description: Problem-solver at heart, passionate about Linux (NixOS) and open-source apps.
hero.about-work: I work as a programmer and love writing clean, readable code
hero.about-code-style: No snake_case! Only kebab-case, PascalCase and camelCase
hero.about-nixos: A dedicated NixOS user — I value minimalism, stability, and control
hero.about-free-time: In my free time, I work on personal projects like FreesmLauncher or Kaede
